import React from 'react' import { minutesToDuration } from '../utils/duration' function Focus({ increaseFocusTimer, decreaseFocusTimer, focusTimerMins }) { return (
{/* TODO: Update this text to display the current focus session duration */} Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusTimerMins)}

) } export default Focus
